00032   tlm_annotated_req_rsp_channel( int req_size = 1 , int rsp_size = 1 ) :

00058   void bind_exports() {
00059 
00060     put_request_export( request_fifo );
00061     get_request_export( request_fifo );
00062     
00063     put_response_export( response_fifo );
00064     get_response_export( response_fifo );
00065 
00066     master_export( master );
00067     slave_export( slave );
00068 
00069   }
